channel.title: Everything is on
channel.description: Ok, i got my no-ip running i have portforwarded my compiler works, i can run server fine...but when i run my sever it says this :Starting Potent Pk Server Online!!! 0.0.0.0=43594..so i have to run my server on 0.0.0.0 not my no-ip, "2xblade.no-ip.biz" but when i try to register server it says "can only reigster online servers..." Anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Everything is on
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

did your portforward your router?

192.168.0.1
192.168.1.1
192.168.1.254

those are the default router ports

What should i do>?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 26, 2007, 01:47:33 PM[/size][hr]But i cant reigister server…i tried “2xblade.no-ip.biz” and 0.0.0.0 for Ip while i had server running and it says it offline…

You can login on 0.0.0.0, but everyone else Has to login through your no-ip.
